name: Choosing The One
description:
"Choosing The One" by Andrew Dyet

You are Oblenor Umberis The Wise, advisor the Kings and Queens of the land. Known for bringing down Solumaun and his Necklace, Vordamit the Shadow King, and the Genie Killer Jarquad. 

Recently, there has been a lack of great evils or chosen ones in need of a mythical guide like yourself. Without these villains or heroes, the royal courts have left you unemployed.

It's about time a new hero comes along and gives you work. Why not give them a little encouragement?

"Choosing The One" is a demo game by sole developer Andrew Dyet.
